arStrings.szText: "This crossbow looks like yours. Know anything about it?"
Burning Hells... Rea. Yes, I know it. This is my old crossbow. Named it after the only woman I ever loved. Heh, the only one my brother loved, too. She married him.
Carved her name into the hilt so I'd never forget her, or what she did. But then I got old, and the memories started to fade, orâ€¦ anyway. Anger just doesn't burn quite as hot now.
Ended up throwing it into the swamp. You keep it. I don't need to hold so tight to her anymore.
